summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3557, for the improvement of the alley in block 38, John H. Nagle's 1st Addition, to the City of Seattle, being the alley extending from East Howell Street to East Denny Street, between 12th Avenue and 13th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43975 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
